title: XDM Decision Event - Details for Reporting
description: Extension for DecisionEvent that adds dimensions for rollup by organization, container and/or batch.

https://ns.adobe.com/adobecloudplatform/.title: IMS Organization Identifier
https://ns.adobe.com/adobecloudplatform/.description: An identity associated with the organization that maintains the library of business objects and rules for this decision.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/decision.title: Container Identifier
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/decision.description: An identity associated with the library of business objects and rules for this decision.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/decision.title: Batch Identifier
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/decision.description: An identity associated with the decision event, if the request was made in batch mode. This property will be absent if the decision leading to this event was made individually for a single profile identity.
